# donate(intent:)

**Instance Method**

Donates an AppIntent to the transcript.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult func donate(intent: some AppIntent) async throws -> IntentDonationIdentifier
```

## Donating intents to the system

- **donate(intent:)**: Donates an AppIntent to the transcript.
- **donate(intent:result:)**: Donates an AppIntent and IntentResult to the transcript.
- **donate(intent:result:)**: Donates an AppIntent and IntentResult to the transcript.
